definition: to enjoy fully/to experience to the full over a long period
variant of 嘗|尝[chang2]/to taste/to experience

sentences.english: Other plants can't do without tanking up loads of sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 其它的植物就非得饱尝充足的阳光。

sentences.english: Teenagers experience a feeling of isolation.
sentences.chinese: 青少年饱尝了一种孤立感。

sentences.english: He is no stranger to poverty.
Therefore they shall eat the fruit of their own way, and shall be filled with their own devices.
sentences.chinese: 所以他们必要自食其果，饱尝独断独行的滋味。

sentences.english: They suffer from thirst first and always.
sentences.chinese: 由于他们总是饱尝口渴的折磨。

sentences.english: People in many countries are suffering from public hazards. 6.For example, …
sentences.chinese: 现在许多国家的人民饱尝公害之苦。

sentences.english: Your pain and your hunger, they're drivin' you home.
sentences.chinese: 你饱尝的苦楚和困乏，催促著归家的脚步。

sentences.english: Nourished lavenders have been surrounded by chained hearts.
sentences.chinese: 用串联的心萦绕著饱尝滋养的薰衣草。

sentences.english: Even so being full of your ne'er-cloying sweetness.
sentences.chinese: 同样，饱尝了你的不腻人的甜蜜。

sentences.english: This legendary man has endured almost all the bitterness of human life.
sentences.chinese: 这位传奇人物曾饱尝人世的辛酸。

sentences.english: The life expectancy of these hardy settlers upon arriving was two years.
sentences.chinese: 这些饱尝磨难的拓居者到达新大陆后的寿命只有两年。

sentences.english: Of the fruit of a man's mouth shall his belly be satisfied: and the offspring of his lips shall fill him.
sentences.chinese: 人必以口中果实充满肚腹，必饱尝自己唇舌的出产。

sentences.english: He had strong beliefs against racism and went to prison for his people.
sentences.chinese: 他反对种族主义，为了他的人民他曾饱尝牢狱之苦。

sentences.english: He knew poverty and sorrow in his early days.
sentences.chinese: 他早年饱尝过穷困和忧愁。

sentences.english: As long as you watch, can have beautiful scenery along the way.
sentences.chinese: 只要你细心观看，就能饱尝沿途美景。

sentences.english: Make it too short and you’ll end up frustrated.
sentences.chinese: 如果过短，最终会使你饱尝挫折。

definition: to suffer enough from/to suffer all kinds of/to have one's fill of
to have experienced a lot of/to have been through
homeless and miserable (idiom); to wander about in a desperate plight/to drift
sour, sweet, bitter and spicy hot/fig. the joys and sorrows of life
destitute and homeless (idiom); displaced and without means
